entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
